tool_description: Lookup product data -- like name, image, description, and ingredients -- using any barcode number (UPC, EAN, GTIN, ISBN)
name: Go-UPC Product Lookup
title: Go-UPC Product Lookup

api_list.name: Product by Barcode
api_list.description: Retrieves product data based on the given barcode. Supports the following fomats: UPC, EAN, GTIN, ISBN.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://go-upc-product-lookup.p.rapidapi.com/code/829576019311"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "go-upc-product-lookup.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://go-upc-product-lookup.p.rapidapi.com/code/{code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "go-upc-product-lookup.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
